name: Warframe
description: This installer is Esync and DXVK ready.
notes:
If you get DirectX errors, it means you're missing vulkan libraries. You need both 32 bit and 64 bit vulkan libraries installed on your system for your distro. The reason is because the game is 64 bit but the launcher is 32 bit so the launcher checks for 32 bit.

For issues, feel free to join my (GloriousEggroll)'s discord. We h ave many users using a variety of methods to play the game including my launcher and a custom proton version for steam:

https://discord.gg/6y3BdzC

**************************

There is no discord integration in warframe because in order to do so would be against the Warframe TOS:

https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1003139-simple-question-regarding-discord-rpcdll-for-devs/

task.description:
Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.
------------------------------
To progress, manually continue installation in that window.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- launcher: http://content.warframe.com/dl/Warframe.msi
game:
  arch: win64
  exe:  $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Warframe/Downloaded/Public/Tools/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Warframe
    src: launcher
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.

      ------------------------------

      To progress, manually continue installation in that window.'
    executable: launcher
    name: wineexec
system:
  env:
    PBA_DISABLE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: 1.3.3
  esync: true
  version: lutris-wf-nofshack-4.15-x86_64
